        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${HDF5_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${IMP.EM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${PYTHON-IHM_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${HDF5_LINK_PATH}
        ${IMP.EM_LINK_PATH}
        ${NUMPY_LINK_PATH}
        ${PYTHON-IHM_LINK_PATH})

include(Files.cmake)

set(IMP_TEST_ARGUMENTS "--run_quick_test" "--deprecation_exceptions")
set(IMP_LINK_LIBRARIES IMP.bff-lib
    ${IMP_kernel_LIBRARY};${IMP_cgal_LIBRARY};${IMP_algebra_LIBRARY};${IMP_display_LIBRARY};${IMP_score_functor_LIBRARY};${IMP_statistics_LIBRARY};${IMP_core_LIBRARY};${IMP_container_LIBRARY};${IMP_atom_LIBRARY};${IMP_em_LIBRARY}
    ${IMP.EM_LIBRARIES};${NUMPY_LIBRARIES};${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES};${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES};${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES};${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES};${CGAL_LIBRARIES};${HDF5_LIBRARIES};${PYTHON-IHM_LIBRARIES};${BOOST.REGEX_LIBRARIES})
